name: Degenerate Art: The Art and Culture of Glass Pipes

review.name: Very Good!!!
review.reviewBody:
This documentary is a very well put together calibration of the history and evolution of blowing glass pieces. 

It's very dynamic and explains how the different techniques and styles evolved. 

To me it's a very highly recommended film that will show you some amazing art/bongs. 

Art is everything though, right? So bongs/pipes MUST be ART! Have a great 420 and take a nice bong hit for myself, as I will for you!

I would give this movie a definite watch, if not own... So go buy it!

It appeals not only to bud smokers but also to artists! Or glass-makers that want to improve their scope/talent!
